title: Real-time analysis
content:
# Real-time analysis

2022-07-07 17:08

You can see the real-time data about the mini program on the current date. You can also select one day before the current date or a time period from any date in the past week to the current date.

# Features

You can benefit from the following features:

- **Overview**

You can see a data overview of the current date and daily growth rates of the following items:

- Number of users calculated by the user ID
- Number of users calculated by the device ID
- Page visits

It's also supported to select one day before the current date to view the data.

![image.png](https://yuque.antfin.com/images/lark/0/2021/png/5956329/1615800938288-e1d05261-bfde-46e4-8691-821ad4c31ecf.png#height=359&id=x5yG1&margin=%5Bobject%20Object%5D&name=image.png&originHeight=570&originWidth=1184&originalType=binary&size=191124&status=done&style=stroke&width=746)

- **Page Visits**

You can select a time range to check the performance of every single page in a table, which includes the following fields:

- Page Path
- Visits
- Visitors
- New Visits by Shared Users
- Time on Page (sec)
- Shared Users
- Total Shares

![page visits.png](https://yuque.antfin.com/images/lark/0/2021/png/217662/1611287073265-1eeb722d-944d-4ff0-88d9-7b1567f29f30.png#height=1005&id=Kbr94&margin=%5Bobject%20Object%5D&name=page%20visits.png&originHeight=1005&originWidth=2368&originalType=binary&size=147354&status=done&style=stroke&width=2368)

- **Version Adoption**

You can select a time range to see the ratio of different mini program versions that are used by users.

![Version adoption.png](https://yuque.antfin.com/images/lark/0/2021/png/217662/1611287147605-c2b413cb-29c0-47a7-bab3-2be09cd49234.png#height=851&id=fHPTv&margin=%5Bobject%20Object%5D&name=Version%20adoption.png&originHeight=851&originWidth=2401&originalType=binary&size=172333&status=done&style=stroke&width=2401)

- **Success Rate of JSAPI Calls**

You can see the payment success rate that is calculated by the total number of payment requests and the number of successful payments. The following JSAPIs are called for this capability:

- my.tradepay
- getAuthCode
- getOpenUserInfo

![890F5B52-BF75-48BF-BA26-FE82BDA5EAD0.png](https://yuque.antfin.com/images/lark/0/2021/png/276536/1618916713730-5c308d57-76c6-450c-87e3-2a46072a3da3.png#clientId=uf91fc345-f5ee-4&from=ui&id=ph1Yk&margin=%5Bobject%20Object%5D&name=890F5B52-BF75-48BF-BA26-FE82BDA5EAD0.png&originHeight=562&originWidth=2550&originalType=binary&size=127014&status=done&style=stroke&taskId=uab6b6711-b747-4370-8492-cf525258e8b)

- **JSAPI errors**

You can see the error details, such as error code, description, number and time of occurrence, and so on.

The following JSAPIs are called for this capability:

- my.tradepay
- getAuthCode
- getOpenUserInfo

![3D26A521-21BA-47FD-8620-30FFD86846F9.png](https://yuque.antfin.com/images/lark/0/2021/png/276536/1618920234477-5fa43599-c1c6-4de5-992f-1bc64e9e728a.png#clientId=ueebd9c79-3d2d-4&from=ui&id=WRNE2&margin=%5Bobject%20Object%5D&name=3D26A521-21BA-47FD-8620-30FFD86846F9.png&originHeight=424&originWidth=1398&originalType=binary&size=79503&status=done&style=stroke&taskId=u2c6e55bd-1dea-4fb3-be0d-fc58da95c54)
